attributes.action: Replace Michael Martin as the Commons Speaker
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Michael Martin should be temporarily or permanently replaced as the Speaker of the House of Commons:

1. Can he be impartial about MPs expenses given that the press previously exposed the claims made for taxi use by his wife?

2. His ill tempered rebuttal of David Winnick and Kate Hoey was belittling, inaccurate and irrelevant. He failed to defend democracy and treats MPs inconsistently. 

3. His failure to tackle the issue of MPs expenses impartially is as injurious to British democracy on the global stage as the abuse of the expenses system itself.

4. He hasn’t grasped the public sentiment about MPs abusing the expenses system for their own gain.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
